Briefs.content: Application developer consultant with 3+ years of hands-on experience designing, developing and implementing web applications and solutions using a range of technologies and programming languages.
Front-end development of desktop and web applications using HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React JS, Angular.
Experience with Agile methodologies/SCRUM working environment, front- end development using Agile methodology.
Experience with both large- and small-scale web projects with a full project lifecycle.
Experience with GIT source control, Jira...
Coordinating with both the UI & visual designers and back-end developers.
In-depth knowledge of cross-browser compatibility and optimization techniques.
